definition: fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86
gun/firearm/rifle/spear/thing with shape or function similar to a gun/CL:支[zhi1],把[ba3],桿|杆[gan3],條|条[tiao2],枝[zhi1]/to substitute for another person in a test/to knock/classifier for rifle shots
hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.chinese: 近衛軍火槍手能持續射擊了。

sentences.english: I came here with the intention of requesting the uniform of a Musketeer.
sentences.chinese: 我來此的目的是想請您賜予我一件火槍手軍服。
瞎眼的老鼠，火槍手，命運。

sentences.english: D'Artagnan, you want to be a musketeer. This is your chance.
sentences.chinese: 達達尼昂，你想成爲火槍手？你的機會來了。

sentences.english: Sacrifice Ritual doesn't take effect on Rifleman Bug fixed.
sentences.chinese: 修正巫妖犧牲儀式對矮人火槍手無效的錯誤。

sentences.english: What was the name of the third musketeer?
sentences.chinese: 第三個火槍手叫什麼名字？
